name: Chaos Cuisine
description:
Chaos Cuisine is a Free To Play mobile game where you can manage restaurants all over the world, unlock different ingredients per cuisines, and upgrade your utensils to satisfy your clients!

This build includes: 

  • First Time User Experience 
  • Level 1 (easy) 
  • Level 10 (hard) 
  • A shop with boosters and upgrades 

This project was created in 2021 in around 1,5 months. Due to limited production time, there are only two levels, but they represent our intended gameplay! 


This game was created by a team of 9 students.
